interbase.interclient
Class ErrorCodes

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--interbase.interclient.ErrorCodes
public final class ErrorCodes
extends Object

An enumeration of InterClient error codes. This enumeration contains all error codes for SQL exceptions generated by the driver itself. SQL exceptions which originate from within the InterBase engine will use the standard isc error codes which are found in the InterBase ibase.h include file.

Also see SQL States.

Since:
Extension, since InterClient 1.50
